alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cumberland; Coastal York; Interior Waldo; Lincoln; Sagadahoc (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 10 at 10:06AM EST until December 11 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 7 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility of a quarter-mile or less in dense fog. For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Interior Waldo, Lincoln, Sagadahoc, Coastal Cumberland, and Coastal York Counties. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 3 PM EST this afternoon. For the Wind Advisory, from 1 AM to 7 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and decorations. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Cumberland; Coastal York; Interior Waldo; Lincoln; Sagadahoc
